name: Shooting Strike: Special Force
description:
Terrorists and evil business tycoons have some deep roots now in various Middle East and other regions and if they are not stopped and uprooted right now, the terrorist activity would increase with time which would be poisonous for nations around the globe. US Army has found a heaven on earth for terrorists. So get ready to be a city fighter & shoot and push all those war criminals insurgent elements from their stronghold. You have been assigned this duty as the Lead freedom force Commando soldier for this crucial military operation to be conducted in region and it is your duty as a war fighter to first recon and take the wildlands back from terrorist, war criminals, mafia tycoons and cartels. Retaliate sensibly and make effective cover to cover moves to stay safe. Shooting Strike: Special Forces is critical. Forget hand to hand combat and get ready to strike enemy right in its heart.

Features
Addictive game play
Free to play 3D Modern FPS Action game
Challenging missions to accomplish
Real like sound effects
Various weapons to use
Chance to be a US Army Commando
Map to find enemies
